tagline.title: BALI WATER SPORTS AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS COMBO JOURNEY TO ENJOY WATER SPORTS ACTIVITY AND THEN SEE THE STUNNING VIEW OF MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO AT KINTAMANI VILLAGE

tagline.html: BALI WATER SPORTS AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS COMBO JOURNEY TO ENJOY WATER SPORTS ACTIVITY AND THEN SEE THE STUNNING VIEW OF MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO AT KINTAMANI VILLAGE

description.text: Bali Water Sports and Kintamani Tour is a Bali Combination Tour Packages we made for you to do the fun of Marine Activity at Tanjung Benoa Beachand keep going by visiting the stunning view of Volcano at Kintamani Village. Great experience we offer for your holiday by offer two different activity on one day, is best blend to do water sports activity at the best beach in Bali with clean water and white sands along the coast, you will enjoy the Flying Fish, Banana Boat, Glass Bottom Boat and Turtle Islands, then after completion water activity, you will enjoy lunch with Indonesia menu in local restaurant, After the lunch complete the Water Sports and Volcano View Tour packages will keep on visiting the Kintamani village for see the view of Mount Batur volcano and the lake from the distance, is great sensation to see the mountain view in during your journey in this amazing islands, After see the view of volcano we will visiting the Bali Coffee Plantations, this visit is perfect choices for those like to drink coffee, in here you can try the testing coffee for free and see wide variety the coffee plants including the famous coffee luwak or known as civets coffee. Then the water sport and Kintamani tour packages will enjoy visiting the best and popular rice terrace site at tegalalang rice terrace on the hill bank, this site is popular stop during the Ubud Kintamani Tour. Our expert Bali Driver will give best services in this Bali Water Sports and Kintamani Volcano View Tour by perform superb Bali Tour Service during your journey. The following is short description and the cost of Bali Water Sports and Kintamani Tour you will visit.

title.title: Kintamani Village Volcano View | Bali Water Sports and Kintamani Tour

image.title: Kintamani Village Volcano View | Bali Water Sports and Kintamani Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kintamani, Batur and Penelokan towns sit on the edge of the colossal Batur caldera around 1,500m above sea level, and offer hair-raising points of view of the element wellspring of fluid magma Mount Batur and serene Lake Batur. The essential interest for visitors is spotted around Lake Batur where Penelokan town gives superb viewpoints of this pit lake and Mount Batur, set in a boundless volcanic caldera. Photo opportunities prosper. Kintamani region is the most settled extent to have been recorded in history of Bali. It was in all likelihood due to its amazingly animating trademark view

description.text: Bali Coffee Plantation is coffee farm or most known as a Bali Agro tourism which celebrated with the various sorts of coffee creation. Experience to perceive how to make Balinese espresso in extremely conventional ways, and taste the new of Balinese espresso or ginger tea with green perspective stream valley. You can sit dismissing the farm and admire a freshly arranged mug of coffee delivered utilizing beans released from an Asian Palm Civet. To be ensured the coffee is protected to eat up, see around the farm to see how they cook the beans and even view a coffee expending civets close up

title.title: Tegalalang Rice Terrace | Bali Water Sports and Kintamani Tour

image.title: Tegalalang Rice Terrace | Bali Water Sports and Kintamani Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tegalalang Rice Terraces is eminent for its brilliant scenes of rice paddies including the subak (ordinary Balinese supportive watering framework system), which according to history, was passed around a regarded favored man named Rsi Markandeya in the eighth century. Tegalalang structures the three most astonishing terraced scenes in Ubud's conferred region. Tegalang alone has a perspective that spreads down before you and away to the rice yards on the inclinations over the valley. The high roadside region is cool and swirling and it is an amazing spot for voyagers to stop and take photos.

price.title: Bali Water Sports and Kintamani Volcano Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Water Sports and Kintamani Volcano Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,500,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,100,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 950,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 850,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 800,000/person

Note : Get special price for group booking

Bali Water Sports and Kintamani Volcano Tour include :

  • Private Car with good A/C
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Watersports Packages :
    1. Flying Fish (2 Fly)
    2. Banana Boat (15 Minutes)
    3. Glass Bottom Boat and Turtle Islands (60 Minutes)
  • Donation at Turtle Islands
  • Entrance Fee to all site based on Itinerary
  • Lunch Indonesian food
  • Mineral Water
  • Using facilities locker, shower and changing room
  • Insurance coverage during water sports activities

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
